mapper.select: SELECT TST_USER_NICKNAME, TST_USER_ID, TST_USER_PW, TST_USER_EMAIL, TST_USER_ISACCOUNTNONEXPIRED, TST_USER_ISACCOUNTNONLOCKED, TST_USER_ISCREDENTIALSNONEXPIRED, TST_USER_ISENABLED, TST_USER_BLACK FROM TST_USER WHERE TST_USER_ID = #{tst_user_id} AND TST_USER_KEY = 'Y'

mapper.select: SELECT TST_MESSAGE_NO, TST_FROM_NICNAME, TST_FROM_DATE, TST_MESSAGE_TITLE, TST_MESSAGE_CONTENT, TST_MESSAGE_CATEGORY FROM TST_MESSAGE WHERE TST_TO_DELFLAG = 'N' AND TST_TO_NICNAME=#{tst_to_nicname} ORDER BY TST_MESSAGE_NO DESC
